featured.text: Yet, it has consistently yielded many of the world’s best distance runners.
Added to this early training is a physical trait shared by people there－disproportionately long legs, which is advantageous for distance runners.
For example, an injured runner might end up cycling and swimming instead of running.

other.text: A strong desire burns inside Bekoji’s young runners.
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a factor for the excellence of distance runners in Ethiopia? .

definition.en_def: A person who runs, especially in races or as a form of exercise.
definition.example: She is a dedicated runner who trains every morning.
